extraction.title: does not work on devices without google play services
extraction.description: google play services is not present on all android devices also, it is proprietary. It would be awesome if this app could be included in f-droid repository. They do not allow proprietary software dependancy.maybe https://github.com/mapzen/LOST would help
extraction.comments:
The Play Services are an integral part of the app as they're used for location services.
As such, there will probably never be a version without them, sorry.
